name: #mondaythoughts Game
description:
The game is currently available for download on iOS and Android. The game features the team from Outhouse Media.
The idea was born after a couple of weeks of brainstorming, when we saw that online games are still very popular in many regions around the world. We wanted to give the players the chance to play along with the team from their country and play with their fellow gamers in a special way. So we decided to seek the approval of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs and famous Chinese gamer, Luo Guangzhu. He was instrumental in organizing the Chinese Special Game Convention in New York City. The game is in the final stages of development and we call on you, players, to help us to bring it to the world.
